“釣魚是等待的藝術”?哦~NO!!!在《釣魚發燒友》3秒就能讓魚兒上鉤，並讓你在短暫的休息時間也能盡享釣魚的樂趣。</p><p>2.真正的3D！<br>- 像是能跳到你眼前的活蹦亂跳的魚，收起魚線後魚竿的美麗曲線，還有緊繃的魚線在左右顫動時帶給你的超緊張感！<br>- 見識一下以Full 3D的完美釣魚吧。一定會讓你體驗到就像真的是在現實中釣魚的一樣。</p><p>3.複雜的機制！呈現活蹦亂跳魚類AI！<br>- 通過卷線輪的齒輪，將各種魚竿的放線距離完美呈現！<br>- 長時間的對持之後，通過逐漸疲憊的魚兒的AI體驗到的真實手感！<br>- 根據各種魚類的特徵呈現的，魚兒垂死掙扎的“脫鉤”動作！<br>- 簡單的操縱中隱藏複雜的機制！親自體驗一下更真實的釣魚手感吧！</p><p>4.夢想中的那個地方！世界著名釣魚聖地！<br>- 從夏威夷再到亞馬遜~ 體驗只有在電視中才能看見的黃金漁場吧。<br>- 不僅能感受到水花四濺的逼真效果，還能見到只有在當前地區才會出現的各種魚類。小心！因為效果太逼真，你有可能會暈船哦~</p><p>5.能與全世界釣手們一比高下的自主競爭！<br>- 每條魚都會記錄最大的魚。通過每個時間進行的釣魚大會，與全世界著名釣手們展開對決吧。<br>- 每次釣到魚時都會自動保存記錄。你是排名是？<br>通過每次釣魚後的點數，可自主進行競爭。與好友的競爭或通過與全世界釣手們的競爭，展示你的實力吧。</p><p>6.噓！一般人我不告訴TA~！<br>- 通過不斷的升級，以後將會添加可與好友一起進行釣魚或對戰的功能。以魚類為目標，與好友展開的激烈鬥爭~！這一切~都將在《釣魚發燒友》中相見。</p><p>本遊戲的部分道具收費。在購買收費道具時會產生一定的費用，並根據道具種類的不同可撤銷或被限制。<br>關於本遊戲使用條款的條件(解除合約/撤銷 等)可以在遊戲內或Com2uS智慧手機服務使用條款(可在官網http://www.withhive.com中查看)中進行確認。<br>關於本遊戲相關的疑問解答，可以通過Com2uS官網或客服郵箱：info@com2us.cn 進行瞭解和諮詢。</p><p>本軟體依中華民國遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為：普遍級。<br>本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣，物品等付費服務，請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a 《遊戲特色介紹》<br>LINE經典棒球手遊,好友互動運動休閒遊戲第一首選,<br>棒球專家、熱血球迷、運動同好，或不懂棒球也可輕鬆上手<p>遊戲以即時連線對戰、排名賽、全壘打大賽以及挑戰精典賽事結合了單機、多人對戰以及排名賽爭奪，喜愛回顧經典挑戰歷年勁旅、享受刺激暢快的排名賽又或是熱愛即時連線手動對戰與好友一絕高下的玩家絕對不能錯過，更可在遊戲中收集CPBL和大聯盟各年度大聯盟真人圖像球員劃時代巨星並組合出屬於自己的王牌隊伍！！</p><p>《全國至霸排名賽》<br>玩家可藉由排名賽獲得爭奪獲得高額獎勵外，於對戰中可自行選配戰術，例如於投手方時可進行故意四壞保送 台球 - Pool Billiards Pro  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TerranDroid" title="TerranDroid">TerranDroid</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.forthblue.pool"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEmNvbS5mb3J0aGJsdWUucG9vbBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  歡迎來到台球大師專業版遊戲!這是安卓排名第一的台球遊戲，並且它完全免費! <p>遊戲特點： <br>1. 逼真的3D物理效果 <br>2. 觸摸控制來移動球桿 <br>3. 玩法有8球和9球 <br>4. 單人模式：直接撞球遊戲（沒有規則） <br>- 挑戰模式（2分鐘的時間限制來挑戰高分記錄） <br>- 練習模式（沒有時間限制也沒有高分記錄） <br>5. 人機對戰（有規則） <br>6. 街機模式： 90個挑戰關卡（沒有台球規則）</p><p>遊戲玩法： <br>1. 單人模式（沒有規則） <br>把指定的球都撞入籃中。擊入越多的球，得分就越高。觸摸屏幕來調整方向，拖拽右邊的力度條，鬆開後擊球。 <br>挑戰模式的初始時間是2分鐘，每當擊入一個球，便會獲得額外的時間。當所有的球都被擊入後，台上會產生一組新的球來保證遊戲繼續進行。也可以進入練習模式，沒有時間限制，也沒有高分記錄。 </p><p>2. 人機對戰模式（有規則） <br>和電腦AI對戰，有標準的8球和9球規則。觸摸屏幕來調整方向，拖拽右邊的力度條，鬆開後擊球。自由球模式，按住任意位置移動母球，再次點擊母球確認地點。 </p><p>3. 街機模式（全新並沒有台球規則）<br>玩家需要在給定的桿數內將球檯上所有的球打進球袋中。該模式下沒有時間和台球規則的限制，但是注意你只有有限的桿數。</p><p>快去玩吧！</p><p>---</p><p>Welcome to the Pool Billiards Pro game! How about a nice little game of pool? This is the No.1 Pool game in Android market and it's totally FREE.</p><p>Game Features:<br>1. Realistic 3D ball animation<br>2. Touch control for moving the stick<br>3. 8 Ball Pool and 9 Ball Pool<br>4. Single Player Mode: Straight Pool Game (no rules)<br>- Challenge (2 minutes time limit with high score record)<br>- Practice (no time limit but no high score record)<br>5. Player vs. Computer Mode (with rules)<br>6. Arcade Mode: 90 Challenging Levels (no rules)</p><p>How to play: <br>1) Single Player Mode (no rules)<br>The object of the game is to pocket your set of assigned balls. The more balls sink the higher scores you get. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike.<br>The initial time limit of Challenge Mode is 2 minutes but once you sink a ball you will get additional time. As all the balls have been cleared, the pool will create a new group of balls to keep the game going on. Also you can play the Practice Mode which has no time limit but no high score record.</p><p>2) Player vs. Computer Mode (with rules)<br>Play against the computer AI with standard 8 ball rules or 9 ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike. Touch and hold at any point to move the cue-ball and tap to confirm for Free-ball.</p><p>3) Arcade Mode (New and no rules)<br>You need to pocket all the balls on the table within the given number of cues. There is no time limit and rules for this mode but watch out you have only limited number of cues.</p><p>Rack em!</p><p>Notes: The permissions required in this game is only used for online leader board. Thanks.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.forthblue.pool" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.forthblue.pool" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.1 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 82.3675537109375%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.forthblue.pool"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEmNvbS5mb3J0aGJsdWUucG9vbBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> </div> </div>   </div>  <div class="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-docid="com.cg.tennis" data-original-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-short-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small"> <div class="card-content id-track-click id-track-impression" data-docid="com.cg.tennis" data-server-cookie="CAIaFwoVEhMKDWNvbS5jZy50ZW5uaXMQARgD" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaFwoVEhMKDWNvbS5jZy50ZW5uaXMQARgD" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.cg.tennis" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="指尖網球 3D - href="/store/apps/details?id=com.driftwood.galaxybowl.free" title="銀河保齡球精簡版"> 32.    銀河保齡球精簡版  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Jason+Allen" title="Jason Allen">Jason Allen</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.driftwood.galaxybowl.free"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS5kcmlmdHdvb2QuZ2FsYXh5Ym93bC5mcmVlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Galaxy Bowl 是一款風靡全球的 3D 保齡球遊戲！它模擬了現實運動中的物理現象，有剩餘模式，支持多玩家參與（最多 4 位本地玩家），挑戰多種保齡球玩法（燭柱式、短粗柱式、5 柱式和 9 柱式），您可盡情出球，比賽結果聯機排名，模擬行星背景——讓您盡享無限樂趣！<p>★ 尋找樂趣，開始遊戲吧。點擊設置球位，然後猛划手指出球。傾斜或猛划手指發出一個旋轉球。<br>★ 100 柱挑戰、鐵柱和剩餘模式！<br>★ 燭柱式、短粗柱式、五柱式和九柱式保齡球玩法！它們具有全新的柱型、球、規則和挑戰。<br>★ 精美的 3D 視覺效果。嶄新的球道和光鮮的保齡球在任何設備上都讓人眼前一亮。<br>★ 聯機排名。</p><p>解鎖新的行星主題球，贏得具有挑戰性的球賽，完成您的太陽系之旅。</p><p>您能到達冥王星嗎？</p><p>功能：</p><p></p><p>十柱式保齡球</p><p>是當前世界上最風靡的保齡球遊戲之一。全倒、剩餘和連續三次全倒的分數。</p><p>補中</p><p>練習挑戰剩餘模式。清空賽段，解鎖新球。</p><p>一百柱</p><p>在 100 柱賽事中用 5 次出球擊倒盡可能多的立柱！</p><p>燭柱式保齡球</p><p>於 1880 年首次推出。燭柱式保齡球富於挑戰，它提供一種細長的立柱，當受到撞擊時會發生難以預料的彈跳和旋轉。如果各輪間的立柱未全部擊倒，您可以繼續補擊仍然站立的立柱。</p><p>五柱式保齡球</p><p>於 1904 在加拿大首次推出。在 5 柱式玩法中，每個立柱具有不同的分值。在剩餘模式中可進行戰略性選擇，擊中分值最高的立柱。全勝得分為 450 分！</p><p>九柱式保齡球（德國保齡球）</p><p>起源於中世紀德國，9 柱式玩法是最晚期保齡球遊戲的創建基礎。九個柱以菱形排列，“主柱”位於中心。擊倒全部立柱得 9 分。擊倒除主柱以外的全部立柱得 12 分！</p><p>短粗柱式保齡球</p><p>於 1904 年在新英格兰首次推出，短粗柱式的規則與 10 柱式基本相同，但是允許通過 3 輪出球擊倒所有立柱。球和立柱都相對較小，對精準性提出了更高的要求！</p><p>鐵柱式保齡球</p><p>鐵柱式保齡球與正常保齡球一樣，但是其中一個隨機立柱要比其他立柱重得多。必須仔細考慮如何擊倒較重的立柱，同時又能擊倒正常立柱。</p><p>Galaxy Bowling 提供了購買燭柱式、短粗柱式、五柱式、九柱式、一百柱和鐵柱式保齡球遊戲的選項。十柱式和剩餘模式已包括在內。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 箭頭所指範圍，表示球的旋轉量。<br>- 球朝向箭頭方向彎曲，因此，將其朝相反方向投擲予以矯正。<br>- 球的旋轉量增大，就需要傾斜手指，以適當的角度投擲。<br>- 按動火球按鈕，，您便可投出極有威力的球。</p><p>◈ google + will be a great help to the developer. Boasting fully textured game environments and full 3D rigid body physics this game is the complete package for both casual and serious gamers.<p>The simple click and play interface allows you to pick up and play the game quickly, or alternatively for the more serious players the game includes cue ball control allowing you to perform more advanced shots including back spin, top spin, left spin (Left english), right spin (Right english) and ball swerve. </p><p>So whether you want a simple easy and fun snooker game or a full on simulation this game is for you. </p><p>Download Pro Pool 2015 now and try it for free, you will not be disappointed. </p><p>System Requirements:</p><p>∙ Requires Android 4.0 and above.<br>∙ Requires OpenGL ES version 2 or higher.<br>∙ Auto configures to all screen resolutions and densities.</p><p>Game Features: </p><p>∙ Localized to English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Canadian French and Mexican Spanish.<br>∙ Full High Def 3D textured environments. <br>∙ Full 3D physics at 30 FPS.<br>∙ Free online multiplayer games<br>∙ Free local network multiplayer games<br>∙ Practice: Fine tune your game by playing on your own with no rules. <br>∙ Quick Play: Play a custom match against another friend, family member or computer opponent. <br>∙ League: Participate in a league event over 7 rounds where the highest points total wins. <br>∙ Tournament: Test your nerves in a 4 round knockout tournament event. <br>∙ Configure up to 3 player profiles to keep track of all your statistics. <br>∙ Each profile contains comprehensive statistics and progression history. <br>∙ Select your handicap level with 5 levels of aiming and ball guide mark-ups. <br>∙ Select your preferred post shot camera through your player’s profile. <br>∙ Progress through the ranks from Rookie to Legend. Beware you can go down the ranks as well as up. <br>∙ Play against 25 different computer opponents spread over 5 difficulty levels. <br>∙ Fully customizable tables, choose from over 100 combinations of table finish effects and baize colors. <br>∙ Play pool on regulation 7ft, 8ft and 9ft rectangular tables. <br>∙ Test your skills on the non-regulation Casket, Clover, Hexagonal, L-Shaped and Square tables.<br>∙ Play US 8 Ball, US 9 Ball, US 10 Ball and Black Ball based on WPA rules. <br>∙ Play World Eight Ball Pool based on WEPF rules. <br>∙ Fully featured ball control system allowing back spin, top spin, left spin (Left english), right spin (Right english) and swerve shots. <br>∙ Choose from various camera views including 3D, Top Cushion and Overhead views. <br>∙ 20+ game achievements to Wrestling Revolution 3D  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MDickie" title="MDickie">MDickie</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.WR3DFree"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDGFpci5XUjNERnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The biggest 3D wrestling game on mobiles, now celebrating over 10 MILLION downloads!!!<p>The Wrestling Revolution rumbles into the 3rd dimension, where it now features BOTH aspects of the business in ONE epic universe for the first time ever! A wrestling career challenges you to take shots in the ring, whereas a "booking" career allows you to call the shots backstage - promoting entertaining matches every week for ratings. Seeing each side of the curtain gives you an even better appreciation for the other, and ensures you'll never grow bored of wrestling again! Both modes are available to play for free, with the option to upgrade to enjoy the "Pro" experience with no ads or limitations.</p><p>And if playing Pro isn't enough, a separate "Backstage Pass" allows you to play God by saving your changes to all 9 rosters before pitting your immortals against each other in dream matches of your own creation! With 4 pages of rules to mix &amp; match - including up to 20 wrestlers in rings of any shape or size - the only limit is your imagination. You can also blow off steam with no pressure by revisiting the 8 weeks of supercards from the game's promotional tour. Not to mention the interactive training process that teaches you how to lock up in the first place.</p><p>BASIC CONTROLS<br>The game features an interactive tutorial that you are advised to play through, but the basic controls are as follows:<br>CURSORS = Movement (double-tap to dash)<br>A = Attack (with a direction to aim high, without to aim low)<br>G = Grapple<br>R = Run<br>P = Pick-Up / Drop (with a direction to throw)<br>T = Taunt / Pin / Referee duties<br>EYE = Change focus / Turn opponent around<br>HEALTH METER = Switch character<br>CLOCK = Pause / Change camera angle</p><p>* This game is also compatible with Android controllers such as NVidia Shield 2k or MOGA Pro ("B" Mode).</p><p>PERFORMANCE<br>Although every effort has been made to keep performance as high as possible, some devices may benefit from a visit to the Options menu to fine tune the display:<br>- The number of characters is perhaps the biggest factor so consider turning off referees and setting a limit on the match size.<br>- If you don't want to sacrifice numbers, you can sacrifice polygons instead and opt for "Basic" character models (no fingers).<br>- The ropes are surprisingly demanding and you may squeeze in an extra character if you make them "Static".<br>- Turning off shadows and reducing crowd sprites may also help.</p><p>I regret that there's more to this game than I could ever fit in an app store description, so please consult the online guides for further reading:<br>www.MDickie.com/guides/wr3d_booking.htm</p><p>Or join the debate on social meda:<br>www.facebook.com/MDickieFans<br>www.twitter.com/MDickieDotcom</p><p>* Please note that Wrestling Revolution depicts a fictitious universe and is not affiliated with any real wrestling promotions.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.WR3DFree" aria-hidden="true" </span> </div>  <div class="description">  “拍攝弩豪華” - 拍攝弩在目標模擬器。 <br>拍攝的範圍是10100米進行。在每一個距離給10箭。遊戲的目標是完成所有級別（距離）和評分最高點。 <br>&nbsp;遊戲規則： <br>1要打開下面的距離應在目前的得分至少90分。 <br>2弩近視在10米的距離，這意味著10米處熱潮將下降到撞擊點。在大的距離熱潮將低於瞄準點。在拍攝距離越大，所述校正必須採取高度。 <br>3當目標，必須考慮到風向和風速，並採取校正補償拆遷熱潮。 <br>4完成後，每場比賽都獲得一等獎學分。其值是10投乘以距離的平均結果。積分需要升級弩。 <br>&nbsp;現代化弩： <br>1可以安裝在增強電弧，這會增加一個箭頭的速度從80到100和120米/秒。以較高的速度比拆遷熱潮降低風。 <br>2，另外，可以更換屈光度視力上的準直器或光學便於瞄準。 <br>反射的視線可以讓你用三個不同的瞄準標誌。光學瞄準鏡有放大2倍，並允許您更改網格的照明顏色。 <br>&nbsp;管理： <br>遊戲中有兩種方式來控制，增量和動態。 <br>1步操作： <br>通過點擊該按鈕，在正確的時間“停止”和“停止和拍攝”停弩。進一步的後續拍攝。 <br>2動態控制： <br>使用控件的視線移動到想要的位置。點擊“SHOT”，隨後一桿。 <br>&nbsp;在計算實際彈道計算器使用的使用箭頭技術的軌跡。 <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Mourinho"</p><p>Top Eleven 向全球社群的一亿名注册玩家提供真实的足球管理体验。你可以体验管理足球俱乐部的各个方方面面：创建并训练你的球队，在实时转会市场上购买天才球员并在联赛、杯赛和冠军联赛中和其他经理相互竞争。帮助你的球员提升他们的球技，在排行榜上不断攀升并解锁超赞的成绩。快来玩全新更新的 Top Eleven 2015 趕快下載吧，做一個讓對手膽寒的超級守門員。<br>超級守門員是一款超酷的3D足球守門員遊戲，這款遊戲的最大特點就是擁有絢麗的3D畫面，極強的現場感，以及豐富的道具和玩法。<br>遊戲的基本操作方式就是通過手指的滑動控制守門員的手套，來扑出射向你的點球，但是經常會有一些特殊功能的道具足球，讓你防不勝防。<br>此外遊戲還有兩種模式，第一種是無盡模式，在這種模式下玩家需要扑出足球來獲得經驗值和金幣，然後通過升級解鎖新的道具，之後玩家可以用獲得的金幣購買更多更炫的足球和特效。第二種模式是經典的街機模式，玩家有三條命，如果有球被踢進球門，玩家就會減少一條生命，同樣扑出球也會獲得金幣，這種模式下守門員玩家需要挑戰自己，看最多可以扑出多少足球。每種模式下你連續抱住的球越多，得分和獲得的金幣就會累加的越多，所以盡量連續抱住踢過來球。<p>特性：<br>絢麗的3D畫面<br>2種截然不同的玩法<br>豐富的道具足球<br>豐富的足球種類和特效<br>逼真的音效設計<br>簡單直觀的操作<br>持續更新的遊戲內容</p> The shot types are only limited by your imagination. The simple tap and flick interface allows you to pick up and play the game quickly, or alternatively for the more serious bowlers we have included additional features to allow the ball to be positioned and the shot shaped as required.</p><p>So whether you want a simple easy and fun bowling game or a full on simulation this game is for you.</p><p>Download My Bowling 3D now and try it for bowling balls to choose from.<br>∙ 5 pin styles to choose from.<br>∙ Ball weight customization.<br>∙ 14 Achievements to obtain.<br>∙ Fully adjustable address including position and direction.<br>∙ Full spin control and shot shape setup.<br>∙ Save your favorite shots and watch them with complete video playback.<br>∙ High score tables and statistics per bowling alley.<br>∙ 5 levels of CPU difficulty.<br>∙ Take action photos and save them to your gallery.<br>∙ Full 3D physics at 30 FPS!<br>∙ Full 3D textured environments.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span The ball speed, weight and bounce act like the proper game. Scoring follows standard pocket billiards rules.<p>Pool, also more formally known as pocket billiards (mostly in North America) or pool billiards (mostly in Europe and Australia), is the family of cue sports and games played on a pool table having six receptacles called pockets along the rails, into which balls are deposited as the main goal of play. Popular versions include eight-ball and nine-ball. An obsolete term for pool is six-pocket.</p><p> Features:<br>- 12 unlockable alternate tables with which to play<br>- 5 levels of difficulty to play against<br>- Touch anywhere to play!<br>- True-to-life pocket billiards tables<br>- Realistic pocket billiards ball physics <br>- touch controls; apply spin and swerve with ease </p><p>There are hundreds type of pool games. Some of the most well known include eight-ball, nine-ball, ten-ball, straight pool, one-pocket and bank pool.</p><p>There are also hybrid games combining aspects of both pool and carom billiards, such as American four-ball billiards, cowboy pool and bottle pool.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.trochoi.bida"  </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  改版更新：11/05<br>《全民打棒球：成為總教練》全新改版!!《教練!我想打棒球》<br>全新內容：<br>隊伍作戰室 – 依據各情況的不同,設定作戰方式<br>① 攻擊作戰 設定 – 比賽進行時, 可設定有關攻擊的設定<br>② 守備作戰 設定 – one of the most feature packed and playable darts games available for mobile devices.<p>With fully textured 3D game environments, specialist custom boards for standard and more obscure game types, and millions of possible dart component combinations, Pro Darts 2014 is the complete package for both casual and serious gamers.</p><p>The simple 'swipe to throw' interface combined with an innovative adjustable 'player assist' system allows everyone from novices to pros to pick up and play the game instantly at their own skill level.</p><p>Download Pro Darts 2014 now and try it for free, you will not be disappointed.</p><p>System Requirements:</p><p>∙ Requires Android 4.0 and above.<br>∙ Requires OpenGL ES version 2 or higher.<br>∙ Auto configures to all screen resolutions and densities.<br> <br>Game Features:</p><p>∙ Localised to English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, American English, Canadian English, Canadian French and Mexican Spanish.<br>∙ Full High Def 3D textured environments.<br>∙ Practice: Fine tune your game by playing on your own.<br>∙ Quick Play: Play a custom match against a friend, family member or computer opponent.<br>∙ League: Participate in league events with 3, 5, 7 or 9 rounds where the highest points total wins.<br>∙ Tournament: Test your nerves in a 4 round knockout tournament event.<br>∙ Configure up to 4 unique player profiles.<br>∙ Each profile holds 5 custom darts, comprehensive stats and progression history.<br>∙ Custom dart configuration system allows for millions of combinations of barrels, stems, stem colours, flight shapes and textures.<br>∙ Innovative 'player assist' system to help with getting those tricky doubles and trebles.<br>∙ 3 levels of Oche camera to suit all playing styles.<br>∙ User controlled Orbit Camera and Snapshot system allows you to save close up images of your dart grouping.<br>∙ Ranking system from Rookie to Legend.<br>∙ 28 computer opponents with customisable names.  Play against the pros!<br>∙ Over 10 unique dart boards including 'American', 'Par Darts', 'Hi Score', 'Quadro', 'Mini', 'Snooker', 'Yorkshire', 'Fives' and 'Target' boards, each with multiple colour options.<br>∙ Play 301, 401, 501, 601, 701 and 1001 games on many of the custom boards.<br>∙ Play 'Round the Clock' including special 'doubles' and 'trebles' only variations.<br>∙ Play 'Snooker' darts on three custom boards and standard boards.<br>∙ Play 'Par Darts' (Golf) on three custom boards.<br>∙ Play 305, 405, 505, 605, 705 or 1005 'Fives' games on either the London 'narrow' fives board or the Ipswich 'wide' fives board.<br>∙ Complete control over the numbers of Sets and Legs per match.<br>∙ Multiplayer game modes including 'pass and play'.<br>∙ Free online multiplayer games<br>∙ Free There are three major subdivisions of games within cue sports: Carom billiards, including balkline and straight rail, cushion caroms, three-cushion billiards, artistic billiards and four-ball; Pool, including among others eight-ball, nine-ball, ten-ball, straight pool, one-pocket and bank pool; Snooker and English billiards.<br>維基:<br>桌球，中國大陸又稱台球，台灣又稱撞球，馬新又稱桌球，是一種有多重玩法的技巧運動，其共同點是使用桌球桿撞擊一般為白色的母球，令其在桌球桌上滾動並撞擊其他球（子球），以達成特定目的。 桌球運動的分成如下五大類：開侖：四球競賽、三球競賽、自由球、障礙線及三顆星等。花式桌球(亦稱美式桌球)：其玩法有14.1、8號球、9號球及10號球等。士碌架與英式桌球。俄式桌球：自由派、混合派、動態派等玩法。瓶式桌球。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <br>=============================== <br>&gt; 操作：手指點擊球為：向外擊球。 <br>&gt; 操作：手指向擊球動為:吊球。 <br>&gt; 操作：手指向擊球動為:扣球。 <br>&gt; 操作：手指劃動速度越快，球速越快。 <br>&gt; 操作：手指劃動距離越遠，球打得越高。 <br>&gt; 羽毛球：只有發光時才能打到，如果太遠就會夠不著。 种独特的招式等你掌握，共有数百种组合。随着教程逐步上手并渐入佳境。施展最疯狂的连续技和招式组合，来获得令人惊叹的高分、获得经验点数并让自己荣居名人堂宝座。</p><p>自定义操控<br>全新的完全自定义操控系统，可配置你自己的按键布局。使用右手或左手控制模式，选择控制预设模板或创建你自己的控制方式。你可按需要使用类比摇杆或加速计选项。调节你的支架松紧度来更改你的转向灵敏度。</p><p>丰富功能<br>•支持最新一代设备，并为高分辨率屏幕优化。<br>•在线多人游戏模式，与你的好友和其它滑板手在线对战。<br>•全新的完全自定义操控系统。你可以调节任何操控设置！<br>•学习超过 title="Pool Billiards: 8 Balls"> 193.    Pool Billiards: 8 Balls  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Suen+Mobizz" title="Suen Mobizz">Suen Mobizz</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.BilliardsMania.Android"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS5CaWxsaWFyZHNNYW5pYS5BbmRyb2lkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Welcome to the Pool Billiards: 8 Balls game! How about a nice little game of pool? This is the #1 Pool game 8 balls  in GooglePlay and it's totally FREE, Pool Billiards: 8 Balls is an easy but nevertheless fun and well developed 2D billiard pool game for your phone, It is challenging and waiting for awesome pool players!<br>Pool billiards, is the family of cue sports and games played on a pool table having six receptacles called pockets along the rails, into which balls are deposited as the main goal of play. Popular versions include eight-ball, nine-ball and Soonker. An obsolete term for pool is six-pocket.There are hundreds of pool games. Some of the more well known include eight-ball, nine-ball, ten-ball, straight pool, one-pocket and bank pool.<br>There are also hybrid games combining aspects of both pool and carom billiards, such as American four-ball billiards, cowboy pool and bottle pool.<br>Game Features:<br>- With leaderboard online.<br>- classical 8-ball billiards<br>- Single and two player quick games.<br>- 4 different types of board pool skin.<br>- High quality graphics &amp; Dynamic sound effects..<br>- Intuitive touch controls, apply spin and swerve with ease<br>- Aiming let you shoot with one single finger touch from anywhere on the screen<br>How to play:<br>1) Single Player Mode<br>The object of the game is to pocket your set of assigned balls. The more balls sink the higher scores you get. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike.<br>The initial time limit of Challenge Mode is 2 minutes but once you sink a ball you will get additional time. As all the balls have been cleared, the pool will create a new group of balls to keep the game going on. Also you can play the Practice Mode which has no time limit but no high score record.<br>2) II Player Mode<br>II Player Moder with standard 8 ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike. Touch and hold at any point to move the cue-ball and tap to confirm for Free-ball.<br>Rack em! <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Earn points during races, unlock new goodies and circuits in Quick Challenge mode. Upgrade your bikes and crush your opponents. Use enhanced fuel to improve your performance.</p><p>---- QUICK CHALLENGE MODE<br>Pick your ride, track, number of laps and difficulty level and just jump into the race. More tracks and bikes will be unlocked as you progress through the championship mode.</p><p>---- Different camera angles<br>In-game camera angles convey all the thrills of high speed racing on two wheels. Opt for a standard third person view or the amazing first person view.</p><p>---- Easy handling<br>Thanks to the customizable handling system (including steering sensitivity control based on your device leaning and the brake assist), Ducati Challenge offers user-friendly controls for players of all levels, ranging from beginners to experts.<br>You can choose between arcade and simulation settings to get your favourite driving experience.</p><p>--- Graphic Quality   <br>Thanks to the graphic quality customization, you can choose between 3 different settings to get the best performance out of your device: low quality (no effects), medium quality (anti-aliasing activated), high quality (anti-aliasing + motion blur + high quality particles activated).</p><p>---- Image galleries and achievements<br>The rich game Extras, including unlockable achievements and exclusive Ducati images you can save on your device, will be the icing on the cake for all Ducati fans.</p><p><br>*NOTE: in case of any issues running the game, before posting a bad review, please ask for our support at ducati.challenge-android@dtales.it. 免費下載，免費玩！完全無需用真實金錢購買任何道具<br>✔ 體驗逼真的 3D 巴西，五彩繽紛的畫面<br>✔ 關卡隨機建成，遊戲百玩不厭<br>✔ 基本滑動操縱簡單易用，玩法輕鬆愉快，適合全球小孩和成人一起玩<br>✔ 将胜利的喜悦分享至各受歡迎社交媒體平台，和朋友在排行榜上一比高低，成為跑酷冠軍！<br>✔ 單機遊戲，可隨時隨地離線玩，無需互聯網連接<br>✔ 支持語言：English, Bahasa Indonesia,中文,日本語,ไทย<br>✔ 已為最新的三星 S3/S4/Note 2/Tab 和其他大熒幕平板手機進行優化！</p><p><br>遊戲故事：今天真不是何塞仔的日子-_-!  2014年最盛大的足球會就在何塞眼前，但問題卻連連發生, Flick Home Run! baseball game  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=infinitypocket" title="infinitypocket">infinitypocket</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.infinitypocket.flickhomerun"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5pbmZpbml0eXBvY2tldC5mbGlja2hvbWVydW4QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Apple Appstore BEST of 2012 (PAID/GROSSING) <p>Flick your finger and make a homerun. <br>You can experience a real baseball batting through the physical pendulum. </p><p>This is a game in which you can experience various throws based on the pendulum. The ball will fly further if you can hit the ball directly with the quick flick. Experience a “real-life like” batting simulation. </p><p><br># Easy Control--------------------------- <br>You only use flick to control the batting for this game. The more accurate you flick your finger to hit the ball; it is more likely that you will be a home-run hitter. <br>The rule is simple. Flick your finger with the same feeling in which you would swing a bat in real life. Think of your finger as a bat, and flick it with speed and accuracy. That’s all. </p><p># Movement of the ball------------------ <br>Various kinds of throws are materialized into “real-life like” feelings. Different pitches pull out different various kinds of movements. Thus, the batter may miss the timing and would be hard to hit. </p><p># 10 GAME mode------------------------ <br>You can enjoy this game through 5 kinds of mode. <br>Minor &amp; Major Mode- Hit as many home-runs as you can; as far as you can. <br>Multiplayer Mode- You can compete with other players via Game Center. <br>Moon-Star Mode- Try for a record with the given 9 balls. <br>Training Mode- You can practice with different kinds of pitches. <br>*Bunt mode ( need minor 15step): Drop the ball on the target of the floor correctly. <br>*Total mode ( need bunt 10000 point ) : You’ll meet many different types of the balls from the beginning of the game. <br>*Faster &amp; faster ( need total 25000 point ) : Head-to-head with only fastballs. <br>*Jiant mode ( need F&amp;F 10000 point ) : Match with a Giant pitcher <br>*Cutter mode ( need Jiant 12000 point ) : Match with cutterballs which can cut the baseball bat. </p><p># add 28 Achievement Bonus-------------- <br>1 Achievement = 1 level up bonus!!! </p><p># Level Up System----------------------- <br>You can choose and upgrade 1 of 3 skills every time the exp becomes full.- <br>Power: You can increase the power of the bat <br>Accuracy: You can increase the accuracy of the batting <br>Batting Eye: You can know ahead of the next ball’s pattern </p><p># Home-Run Tip!--------------------------- <br>1.Make a full swing with a fast batting-speed! <br>2.Hit the ball followed from the various thrown pattern with an accurate swing! <br>3.Let’s keep an eye on the ball until the end and predict the change of the pattern! <br>4.Let’s be confident and make a full swing! </p><p># FAQ ------------------------------------- <br>Q : How does STEP UP SYSTEM? <br>A : STEP UP = More balls <br>ex) Minor 1 step = 3 balls <br>Minor 2 step = 6 balls</p><p>Just download this !</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.funsolution.nensho_fg" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.funsolution.nensho_fg" title="シェイプアップ応援ゲーム　ねんしょう！for Girls"> 265.    シェイプアップ応援ゲーム　ねんしょう！for Girls  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E6%A0%AA%E5%BC%8F%E4%BC%9A%E7%A4%BE+Creative+Freaks" title="株式会社 Creative Freaks">株式会社 Creative Freaks</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.funsolution.nensho_fg"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGpwLmZ1bnNvbHV0aW9uLm5lbnNob19mZxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ねんしょう！シリーズ６０万ダウンロード記念セールを開催中です！<p>エピソード２ー８ボイスパックアドオンを<br>６０％OFF(¥1000-&gt;¥400)にてご提供いたします！</p><p><br>ねんしょう！for Girls は史上初の乙女向け恋愛アドベンチャーフィットネスアプリです。</p><p>本作品では豪華声優をキャスティングし、収録ボイス数は約1000ワードもの大ボリューム！！</p><p>桂城 敬（かつらぎ　けい）　 　 CV:浪川 大輔<br>舞園 統馬（まいぞの　とうま） CV:木村 良平<br>司馬 龍司（しば　りゅうじ）　　 CV:小西 克幸</p><p>「ねんしょう！ for Girls」のダウンロードは無料!<br>一部有料コンテンツもご利用いただけますが、<br>最後まで無料でお楽しみいただくことが可能です。</p><p>======================================<br>ねんしょう!って?<br>======================================<br>ねんしょう!は、2011年末に配信を開始した、世界初の萌えトレアドベンチャーゲームです。</p><p>従来のエクササイズアプリとは違い、利便性の追求は後回しに、<br>ユーザーのモチベーション向上に徹底的にフォーカスするという、全く新しいコンセプトで開発されました。</p><p>"ゲームがエクササイズになった"という、未だかつて無い新しい体験をお約束します。</p><p>======================================<br>ありがとうございます！！</p><p>・Grapps様でアプリをご紹介いただきました！！(2013/9/13)<br>http://w.grapps.me/archives/32001373.html</p><p>・オタラボ様でアプリをご紹介いただきました！！(2013/9/12)<br>http://otalab.net/news/detail.php?news_id=3371&amp;SID=</p><p>・アニメイトアニメアプリ様でアプリをご紹介いただきました！！(2013/9/11)<br>http://aniapp.animate.tv/archives/82669</p><p>・オクトバ様でアプリをご紹介いただきました！！(2013/9/6)<br>http://goo.gl/x1z06P</p><p>======================================</p><p>"ねんしょう!"はADVゲームテイストのストーリー中にトレーニングゲームが組み込まれた、新感覚の筋トレアプリです。<br>イケメンホストキャラクター達がイケメンボイスであなたのために運動の回数を数えてくれます。<br>それだけではなく、罵りボイス、はげましボイス、萌えボイス、時には告白ボイスであなたを応援してくれます。</p><p>桂城（本作品のメインホストキャラクター）のトレーニングボイスは、<br>物語の進行に合わせて増えていくよ！</p><p>ゲームをクリアして、ボイスコレクションとイベントスチルのコンプリートを目指そう！</p><p>======================================<br>ストーリー<br>======================================<br>ここは鳳芸術学院。</p><p>鳳音楽団、鳳歌劇団、鳳サーカス、鳳プロダクションなど、日本を代表するエンターテインメント企業を傘下に持つ、<br>芸事で身を立てようとする若者が集う超名門校だ。<br>この学校を卒業し、才能を認められたものだけが、鳳グループの関連企業へ所属が許されることになる。<br>数多くのスターを輩出してきたこの学院は、エンタテインメント業界で成功を夢見る若者が集う、いわば登竜門だ。<br>私はとある理由があって、母親にこの学校に入学させられてしまった。<br>とある理由っていうのは・・・</p><p>「よう、デブ」</p><p>そう。認めたくないけど、多分、わたしが”ちょっと”ぽっちゃりな体型だからだ。</p><p>======================================<br>ゲームシステム<br>======================================<br>このアプリは大きく分けて二つのモードで構成されています。</p><p>ストーリーモード: 日ごろの運動の成果を試し、物語を進めるためのモードです。<br>トレーニングモード: 日々の練習用のモードです。ゲームを進めるために必要な”燃焼ポイント”をゲットすることができます。</p><p>ストーリーモードの各エピソードにはロックがかけられています。※2<br>トレーニングモードでゲットできる燃焼ポイントでエピソードのアンロックが可能です。</p><p>トレーニングモードには、燃焼！ポイントをゲットできる、目標設定と時間制限が可能な"プラクティスモード"と自由に運動できる"フリーモード"の二種類があります。</p><p>ポイントを効率的に溜めるコツ<br>・テンポよくトレーニングする。(2秒~3秒に一回程度が目安です)<br>(途中で休憩するよりは、一定のテンポを維持したほうが効率よくポイントをゲットできます)<br>・トレーニング後にツイッターでつぶやくとボーナスポイントが付加されます。<br>・毎日起動するとボーナスポイントが付加されます。<br>・カレンダー/統計アドオンをご購入いただくとＳＰボーナスが加算されます。<br>・フリーモードでは燃焼ポイントをゲットすることができません。</p><p>======================================<br>よくある御質問<br>Q１　プラクティスモードで燃焼！ポイントがたまらない<br>A１　２～３秒に一回を目標に運動してください。途中でやめてもポイントが減点されることはございませんので、疲れを感じたらトレーニングを終えてください。</p><p>Q2　エピソードプレイ中にトレーニングまで演出をスキップする方法はありますか？<br>A2　画面を２秒くらいタップして離し、もう一度画面をタップしてください。</p><p>Q3　SPボーナスはどうやったらゲットできますか？また、どれくらいのボーナスポイントなのですか？<br>A3　カレンダー・統計アドオンをお買い求め頂くことでＳＰボーナスが発生し燃焼！ポイントが二倍もらえます。</p><p>Q4　鬼畜すぎてクリアできる気がしない<br>A4　タイトル画面-&gt;プロフィール-&gt;難易度選択でソフトモードに設定してください。</p><p>======================================<br>対応機種<br>======================================</p><p><br>--------------------------------------</p><p>ねんしょう！ for Girls 公式サイト　http://nensho-for-girls.net/<br>ねんしょう！ ポータルサイト http://nensho.net<br>PV: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YiKMffyZJ3c</p><p>企画・開発 Creative Freaks<br>http://creativefreaks.net/</p><p>開発協力 Visualworks<br>http://www.visualworks.co.jp/</p><p>主題歌：　しあわせの定義<br>music/lylic/vocal: that<br>PV: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BETMG2HfV2E</p><p>(c)2013 CreativeFreaks / Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike. Touch and hold at any point to move the cue-ball and tap to confirm for Free-ball.<br>3) Arcade Mode (New and no rules)<br>You need to pocket all the balls on the table within the given number of cues. It looks and plays great on both Android phones and tablets taking full advantage of any size screen, even full HD devices.<p>10 Pin Shuffle contains three great games in one, played in a realistic 3D environment. 10 Pin Poker, one of the three games, is FREE! The other two games are available as a single In-App Purchase.</p><p>[1] 10 PIN POKER is a combination of Shuffleboard, Bowling and Five Card Draw Poker. Earn playing cards for Strikes and Spares. Draw new cards when you have five. The player with the best five card poker hand after 10 frames wins. The powerful "Newton" 3D physics engine provides the most realistic pin collisions of any ten pin bowling game available on a mobile device to date. Play on your own, against a friend or against one of several computer opponents of varying skill levels.</p><p>[2] SHUFFLEBOARD the game you’ve enjoyed in your local bar. Play against a friend or a computer opponent trying to out-shuffle each others weights or blast them off the table.</p><p>[3] BOWLING with real 3D pin physics! shots.<br>* Unlock new opponents of increasing skill levels.<br>* Crowd reactions that reflect your moves in real time.<br>* Realistic sound effects capture every nudge, bump, and collision on the table.<br>* Controls that are easy to grasp, but challenging to master.<br>* Turkey rewards and winners animations.<br>* Bowling statistics and game scores are tracked and saved each game.</p><p>From href="/store/apps/details?id=com.moaicity.cocosplay3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.moaicity.cocosplay3" title="曹操打棒球"> 302.    曹操打棒球  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=CocosPlay+Inc." title="CocosPlay Inc.">CocosPlay Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.moaicity.cocosplay3"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS5tb2FpY2l0eS5jb2Nvc3BsYXkzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  　《曹操打棒球》是台灣首款以掛機（放置）類玩法為為主軸的新型態棒球養成遊戲。玩家將在遊戲中扮演一位三國時代的球隊經理，針對球隊內的武將進行買賣與養成。<p>　　遊戲在棒球賽事上將採自動的方式進行。遊戲會依據目前玩家所在的副本地圖不斷的進行亂數配對比賽，而賽事的結果是不會因為玩家離開遊戲而中止，每當玩家重新上線後都會收到一份最新比賽戰況，清楚描述隊伍的勝場數、敗場數、整體攻防率及新加入的球員列表。</p><p>　　養成在《曹操打棒球》裡，武將分為強化、進階、洗鍊，依據不同 “守備位置”、“打擊棒次”、“先發”、“中繼” 等排列，進行對自己最有利的隊伍強化。當然除了球員本身，球隊在比賽中也能使用不同的 “戰術” 去提升勝率，而這部分就靠玩家不斷的提升球隊等級來解鎖更新、更強力的戰術技能。<br> <br>　　社群玩法上，除了常見的 PK 排行榜、積分賽、錦標賽外，未來也規劃結合 RPG 式的全壘打大賽、世界 Boss、聯盟競技等多項玩法。</p><p>　　至於三國武將出場數量方面，除了玩家熟悉的劉備、關羽、張飛之外，人稱一代梟雄的曹操與孫家三代也都有在遊戲中參戰，此外也少不了馬中赤兔、人中呂布的登場。而武將與武將間的歷史關係，在特殊系統「千里尋才」也完整地重現，例如：劉備三請孔明，鳳雛又是孔明介紹到蜀國的...等等人脈關係，讓玩家重溫三國歷史的複雜情結。遊戲總共準備了 300 隻武將讓玩好享受成為三國經理人的霸業。</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.moaicity.cocosplay3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> 賽馬3D模擬器<p>這匹馬模擬器是所有關於賠率並成為一個熟練的馬術這些動物的種族day.Some參與馬術，現在他們已經進入了馬academy.As馬術，你一定覺得“我會贏得我的馬不管是什麼！“馬踏技能在這個瘋狂的馬模擬器的關鍵。賽馬遊戲，像這樣涉及賠率對你的虛擬的馬。這匹馬模擬器遊戲包含了馬店在開始比賽前選擇你的。它們都保存在一個馬厩，你看到了馬天潤馬前。</p><p>這些訓練有素的馬術馬現在已經準備好讓在比賽當天馬狂潮狀態。首先，請從馬店的虛擬坐騎。然後把賭注您選擇的動物種族的獎金，這將是你的選擇動物的賠率來確定。現在，這些以前馬術動物現在已經準備好了一些馬狂潮行動。馬厩是完全與馬學院接受培訓的。在騎馬的馬術認為“我希望我的馬贏！”，作為對馬的賽馬在終點線上運行。這匹馬模擬器將使賽馬遊戲更多的樂趣和從事適合你。</p><p>賽馬模擬器3D的主要特點包括：<br> - 一個馬厩用各種馬匹可供選擇。<br> - 賽馬現實動畫如馬朝著終點線運行。<br> - 將你的動物賭注，看著它賽跑！<br> - 在比賽當天多個攝像機視圖。<br> - 平滑的3D圖形。<br> - 優化的遊戲玩法。</p><p>所以下載賽馬3D模擬器現在，享受一個瘋狂的比賽投注的行動！</p><p><br>3Dee空間是一個大國對提供頂尖的模擬遊戲。不要猶豫，以達到我們出去任何意見或建議。</p><p>相信參觀：<br>https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=3Dee+Space</p><p><br>跟隨我們在Facebook上https://www.facebook.com/3deespace</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Game"> 351.    VolleySim: Visualize the Game  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=VolleySim" title="VolleySim">VolleySim</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.volleysim.volleysim"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS52b2xsZXlzaW0udm9sbGV5c2ltEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Practice Volleyball right on your phone or tablet!<p>Visualize the game of Volleyball like never before.  With VolleySim, you can practice reading the setter and hitter to learn where to be on the court right from your phone or tablet.  Take the court with you wherever you are and get in some extra ball touches.</p><p>What is VolleySim?<br>VolleySim is a virtual training product for Volleyball Players and Coaches in order to visualize specific decision making aspects of the game of volleyball. Our top priority is to ensure the accuracy of a training simulation to empower motivated athletes the ability to train no matter where they are.  VolleySim will train athletes to reach their potential and increase their level of play.  Many players want extra practices, more coaching, and more help to improve, but at a point, the body must rest. VolleySim is designed to allow those athletes who crave more knowledge and more practice a way to practice reading the game, anytime, anywhere.  </p><p>What is reading the game?<br>Reading the game is the ability for you to see what is happening with the other team in terms of both court position and body position in order to anticipate a most likely course of action.  This anticipation will allow you to move yourself and your body in the correct position prior to the ball even starting to move to your side of the court.</p><p>“Learn to anticipate, read the before and at contact actions, and remember the flow and tendencies under stress of opponents....and do it at the right place and time, the better we all will be.” <br>–John Kessel (USA Volleyball’s Director of Sport Development, coaching since 1971 at the collegiate level or above, including Women’s U.S. Open titles in 1986 &amp; 87. A sought after international lecturer, he has conducted 1-2 week seminars in all 50 states, and in over 30 Nations; In 1995, Volleyball Magazine’s special Centennial issue named him one of the 50 most important people in the sport in the past 100 years.)</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.volleysim.volleysim" Maneuver and bust tricks by swiping your fingerboard. Visit the in game directions for additional skateboard tips.</p><p>MINIMUM HARDWARE REQUIREMENTS<br>Currently supporting android devices with a display of 800x480 or larger. class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.dm.Marbles"> <div class="pon" </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  打彈珠，一款有趣的彈珠遊戲。經典，簡單，有趣的童年遊戲。孩子們都會喜歡它。同樣也會帶給你經典童年遊戲的懷舊樂趣。<p><br>*** 遊戲特色 ***<br>◆ 友好的遊戲界面，流暢的遊戲體​​驗<br>◆ 上手簡單，易學，好玩，挑戰在於精通！<br>◆ 5種趣味遊戲模式，帶給你不同的體驗<br>◆ 瞄準，射擊，經典的打彈珠玩法！</p><p><br>*** 基本操作 ***<br>◆ 彈珠大戰:<br>點擊紅色彈珠，拖動並控制射擊力度和方向，放開並射擊。擊落所以黃色彈珠而獲得勝利。</p><p>◆ 彈珠闖迷宮: 利用重力感應，將所有彈珠送入終點。<br>- 被鎖定的彈珠，擊中它可以解鎖。<br>- 潮濕的區域會使彈珠減速更多。<br>- 光滑的區域會加速彈珠移動。<br>- 黑洞會吞噬彈珠。</p><p>◆ 彈珠泡泡龍: 擊落所有彈珠完成關卡任務。<br>- 黃色彈珠碰撞一次之後掉落。<br>- 藍色彈珠碰撞之後減速。<br>- 紅色彈珠碰撞之後加速。<br>- 一次擊落3顆彈珠將會獲得1顆額外獎勵的彈珠。</p><p>◆ 彈珠台球: 斯諾克規則台球遊戲。<br>按順序擊球入袋以獲得最好成績。首先打紅球和彩球，紅球全部入袋之後按照順序打黃球（2分），綠球（3分），棕色球（4分），藍球（5分），粉球（6分），黑球（7分）.</p><p>◆ 彈珠尋寶：<br>投入彈珠， 選擇一個寶箱， 有機會獲得豐厚的報酬。</p><p><br>打彈珠維基信息：<br>打彈珠亦稱為打珠子，是一種歷史悠久且主要玩家為男性兒童的彈珠遊戲，也為世界性的兒童遊戲，它的玩法很多樣（彈珠機，彈珠台，彈球遊戲）。玩家各出數枚彈珠，輸掉的人會失去對彈珠的擁有權，雖玩法多樣但基本姿勢都相同，姿勢是使食指與中指彎曲，中指朝里面，食指朝向外面，接著用食指、中指第一節指彎與拇指中間的指節骨夾住彈珠，然後用拇指中間的指節骨用力向外撥，彈珠就會發射，經常玩的方法為“出綱”或“打老虎洞”。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 지시까지 프로야구 감독이라면 꼭 챙겨야 할 이슈들을 놓치지 마세요. </p><p>7. 누구나 쉽고 자유롭게! <br>- 눈에 쏙쏙 인터페이스로 야구 매니지먼트 게임을 처음 접하는 사람도 쉽게 즐길 수 있어요. <br>- 경기 2배속 플레이, 스킵 모드 등을 통해서 자유롭게 경기를 즐길 수 있어요.</p><p>8. 실제에 가까운 선수 영입 방식!<br>- Lakes."> 403.    Fishing in the Winter. Lakes.  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=appra" title="appra">appra</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.sit.ribalka3"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGgoYEhYKEGNvbS5zaXQucmliYWxrYTMQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Winter fishing in cold climates requires skill and training. You already have the rod, drill and transport. Now you need to buy the bait. To do this, go to the Shop and fill your containers with bloodworms, gammarus, whitebait and maggots.<p>If you've already earned money by catching perch and ruffe at the city lake, you can go to another lake. You need to buy a license and prepare some money for the trip. </p><p>Upon arrival at the lake you need to choose a location. Slide your finger across the screen from left to right to rotate the view, click on the screen to go ahead.<br>Move carefully: Do not step on the holes, avoid thawed ice. Remember that if you fall through the ice, you may die. </p><p>Once you found the right place: drill a hole. Bait the hook and cast the gear into the water releasing the line. Remember that different species of fish live at different depths, so pick the depth individually. Also, select the bait appropriately: Ruffe like bloodworm and maggots; Rudd, Сrucian Carp like bloodworm; perch prefers gammarus while large perch, pike and walleye only hunt small fry.</p><p>The make fish bite, tease it moving the rod up and down by tilting and moving your phone as if it was a real rod, or by swiping your finger across the screen. <br>As soon as you see the bobber move – be sure to immediately set the hook by making a sharp upward snap. Depending on how quickly and swiftly you pull up the rod, you either catch the fish or miss it. Now you need to promptly get the fish out of the water before it lets go – spool the fishing reel fast! </p><p>If you do everything quickly and correctly, fish won’t have a chance to get away! Now put new bait and keep on fishing! </p><p>Bear in mind that each fish bites differently, some raise the spring bobber, some make it very softly and barely noticeable, some sank the gear sharply, just make sure you watch the bobber closely - who knows what fish came up this time? Once you feel confident enough you can disable tooltips in the "Options" menu.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Basketball Dude is packed with stunning 3D real life like graphics, numerous challenging levels and various exciting environments. Avoid obstacles like lamp post, crane, boxes, moon, hot air balloon adds makes game more challenging. Get ready to achieve the target score with just one ball and beat your own high record!<p>*** GAME PLAY ***<br>Basketball Dude features simple touch and drag controls. All you need to do is to tap and drag anywhere on the dotted line to change the angle of your shot and release to shoot the ball into the hoop!</p><p>The game comes with the most realistic physics engine and plenty of tricks to choose from. Its time to have fun inventing more and more shot combinations! class="description">  長弓是一個有趣的和現實的Andr​​oid設備的全3D射箭遊戲。從20碼，你可以拍一個蘋果，一個人的頭部？<p>長弓射箭模擬的所有方面。命中遙遠的目標，需要你巧妙地調整你的目標，並準確判斷風。在微風中搖曳的樹木，可以給你有多強風是一個線索。</p><p>每場比賽是四輪和獎金圓（盡量不要殺死任何人！），你能突破董事會的領導呢？</p><p> - 用你的手指，你的弓，瞄準和借鑒。<br> - 三個難度級別。<br> - 嘗試“羅賓漢”一個額外的挑戰模式！<br> - 詳細的三維圖像和聲音！<br> - 看起來對手機和平板電腦的偉大！</p><p>如何玩：</p><p>在屏幕上滑動一個手指（拇指在屏幕的角落通常是最好的）目標。同時，手指是，用另一個手指畫在船頭的箭頭回。</p><p>放開任一手指火！</p><p>檢查在屏幕右上角的風速和風向。在最高難度級別，陣風搖曳的樹木，風的聲音和灰塵踢將是你唯一的線索。</p><p>困難模式將更具挑戰性的拍攝，從不同的角度。</p><p>“羅賓漢模式從屏幕上刪除弓十字線和風速。你需要使用的經驗和直覺，將比分大！</p><p>的提示：</p><p> - 當你畫一個箭頭，瞄準靈敏度下降到允許更好地控制。</p><p> - 您可以通過移動手指，你使用的畫弓備份取消了一槍。</p><p> - 等待塵埃落定後，開始了新一輪的時刻。它需要一個第二灰塵應對新的風速。這將有助於你在更高的難度級別。</p><p> - 風速度的變化，在新一輪的開始。難度較高水平，具有較高的最大風速。</p><p> - 你能進球最多130點遊戲。</p><p> - 您可以賺取額外的10點，如果你設法取得蘋果（......沒有喉結）的獎金圓。</p><p>最後：</p><p>謝謝你打！請送我如何能提高長弓任何建議。</p><p>祝你好運，弓箭手！</p><p>美麗的主題：quietman 圖形技術，特別針對你的移動硬件進行優化，為你帶來最優秀的滑板滑雪體驗。</p><p>自由滑 <br>自由滑是施展特技的天堂！滑板手借助滑軌、跳板、盒子、原木、岩石還有無數其他自然與人造物體，施展最瘋狂的特技動作！  </p><p>大騰空 <br>要麼玩大的，要麼回家！大騰空是滑板手以高速滑下山坡，然后跳躍至高空並施展特技動作的競賽和比拼。 </p><p>U 型管 <br>在全球最大的 U 型管賽道上俯沖並施展大量特技動作。連續施展多個特技來獲得更多分數，衝擊更高得分。 </p><p>多人遊戲 <br>在滑板滑雪對戰中挑戰你的好友，看看誰才能施展最碉堡的特技動作並穩穩落地！在 Twitter 上與你的好友分享並炫耀你的成績。 </p><p>海量選擇 <br>從 15 位滑板手中選擇，按你的偏好用並你最喜愛的裝備對他們進行詳細定制。海量滑雪板可供你選擇，從不同的尺寸到設計，你可以用它們提升滑板手的技巧和能力。 </p><p>學習滑板滑雪<br>超過 50 種獨有特技動作等你來掌握，還有數百種特技組合。按照教程開始學習並不斷進步。施展最瘋狂的連續技和組合特技來衝擊令人驚嘆的高分，獲得經驗點數並讓自己躋身名人堂。 </p><p>遊戲控制器<br>兼容大多數遊戲控制器。 </p><p>自定義操控 <br>使用全新可完全自定義的操控系統，你可配置你自己的按鈕布局。使用右手或左手操控模式，選擇操控預設或創建自己的操控方式。按你的需要使用虛擬搖杆或加速計。 </p><p>包含多項特性 <br>• 支持所有最新設備，並已為高分辨率顯示屏優化。<br>• 使用在線多人遊戲模式，與你的好友或其他在線滑板手共同遊戲。<br>• 全新可完全自定義的操控系統。你可以調整一切操控元素！ <br>• 學習超過 50 種獨有特技動作，並創造數百種特技組合。 <br>• 大量滑板滑雪地點，包含位於落基山、阿爾卑斯山和日本的 21 條賽道。  <br>• 定制你自己風格的服裝！<br>• 升級你的滑雪板來提升滑板手屬性。<br>• href="/store/apps/details?id=com.generamobile.soccerheroes" title="Soccer Heroes RPG"> 475.    Soccer Heroes RPG  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Genera+Games" title="Genera Games">Genera Games</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.generamobile.soccerheroes"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS5nZW5lcmFtb2JpbGUuc29jY2VyaGVyb2VzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Experience all the excitement and intensity of professional soccer with Soccer Heroes. Take it up the middle, pass, dribble, shoot and… goal! Defeat your rivals and go on to play in the Brazil Cup and lead the international soccer scene. <p>Soccer Heroes emulates the classic sport of soccer in a new and original way. It’s based on cut scenes in which you see the player crossing the field, and when you want (or when an opponent is blocking you) you decide if you want to pass, dribble, or take a shot on goal. A scene shows you if you are successful or not, depending on the ability of the player. But in Soccer Heroes, like in real football, it isn’t only about offense. You also have to know how to defend and choose the best defensive option at each moment to shut out your opponent. When an opposing player takes a shot on goal, the goalkeeper will have the option to block or trap the ball. </p><p>The capabilities of the players are: attack, defend, pass, speed up/slow down, and dribble. You can improve on these skills as you advance through the game, forming a championship team. </p><p>In Soccer Heroes you can manage your squad and sign new players if your team needs a boost to be more competitive. </p><p>Features: </p><p>- Cartoon inspired graphics <br>- Pass, dribble, shoot, score goals, hold your position, tackle and block or trap shots on goal <br>- Buy and sell players to improve your squad <br>- 7 classifying tournaments to reach the Brazil Cup <br>- Get rewards for improving your players <br>- Gain experience and improve your squad </p><p>Stop dreaming and score your href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sit.ribalka" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sit.ribalka" title="Winter Fishing 3D"> 479.    Winter Fishing 3D  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=appra" title="appra">appra</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.sit.ribalka"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGQoXEhUKD2NvbS5zaXQucmliYWxrYRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  To catch a fish you need to check whether there is any bait on the hook. To do this, get the gear and click on the "Fishing reels" icon in the upper right corner. If the hook is empty, put the bait on it. The icon for "Baited hook" is next to the icon "Fishing reels". If you selected the Match type of game, you are able to change the bait clicking on the baited hook again. <br>Remember that different species of fish bite on different bait: raffe like corn, the best lure for rudd, perch and crucian carp is gammarus or bloodworms, while big perch and pike chase little fish only. Now put the gear in the water and cast out the fishing line, then click on the "Fishing reels" icon again. Wait for the fish to get lured by your bait. Some fish get better attracted by teasing - raising and lowering the bait – then they start to bite quickly. <br>As soon as you notice the spring bobber is moving – catch the fish immediately, sharply pull up the rod! Depending on how quickly and swiftly you pull up the bait, you either catch the fish or miss it. Now you need to promptly get the fish out of water before it falls off the hook – click on the "Fishing reels" fast! <br>If you do everything quickly and correctly - fish won’t have a chance to escape! Bait the hook again and continue with exciting fishing! Note that each fish bites differently, some raise the spring bobber, some make it very softly and barely noticeable, some suddenly sank the gear, just make sure you watch the spring bobber closely, who knows what fish came up this time? <br>Once you feel confident enough you can disable tooltips in the "Options" menu. <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sit.ribalka" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a ！<br>3，對球的旋轉：通過扔球時的滑動軌跡來，加以旋轉。</p><p>規則：<br>遊戲由10輪構成。<br>從第1輪到第9輪最多可以扔兩次球，第一次全中了（1次擊倒全部木瓶）的話，進入下一輪，否則，對剩餘的木瓶進行第2次扔球。<br>第二次扔球擊倒該格第一個球餘下的全部瓶子，稱為補中。第10輪當中，全中或者是補中的話可獲得扔3次的機會，否則，扔完2次就結束遊戲。</p><p>通過滑動時的角度和速度，逼真的再現了滑行中的球！ ！</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.crossfd.smartbowling" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div> Popular versions include eight-ball, nine-ball and Snooker. An obsolete term for pool is six-pocket.There are hundreds of pool games. Some of the more well known include eight-ball, nine-ball, ten-ball, straight pool, one-pocket and bank pool.<br>There are also hybrid games combining aspects of both pool and carom billiards, such as American four-ball billiards, cowboy pool and bottle pool.<br>Manipulating the stick with your finger to play the game to control the direction and the force to push to ball, so easy! A batter can't hit this ball easily.</p><p>-Guess hitting<br>If your ball goes into the guess zone, the batter will not leave it.<br>Throwing a ball to one place repeatedly is very dangerous. Ice Fishing Derby  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Pishtech+LLC" title="Pishtech LLC">Pishtech LLC</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.pishtech.mifdf"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEmNvbS5waXNodGVjaC5taWZkZhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  It's a five day fishing derby with a twist.  The forecast for the first day is pretty nice, but it's going to get much, much colder as the days go by.  Start each day at the bait shop to get the tackle you need.  Catch bluegills, crappie, perch, walleyes and northern pike.  At the end of each day you'll collect cash at the weigh-in for the fish you've caught.  Be sure to earn enough to pay for a portable shelter and heater or you're not likely to survive.  Start with some basic gear and catch some panfish, then work your way up to catching the bigger fish.  Once you have the necessities you might get yourself a sonar flasher or even an underwater camera system so you can see what's happening under the ice.  Your goal is simple: Survive the tournament, and earn as much money as possible.  Other fishermen may offer you some interesting trades out on the lake, but be careful what deals you accept!<p>The free version is ad-free but some of the equipment in the bait shop requires an in-app
